vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σόδομα, -ων, τά (Heb. סְדֹם),
Sodom (Gen.13:10, 12, al.): Mat.10:15 11:23-24 Luk.10:12 17:29, Rom.9:29" (LXX), 2Pe.2:6, Ju 7, Rev.11:8.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Sodom, (Gen. 19:24) one of the four cities of the vale of Siddim, now covered by the Dead sea, Mt. 11:23f.; Lk. 17:29; Rom. 9:29; 2Pet. 2:6; Rev. 11:8
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Sodoma (ciudad situada en la parte sur del mar Muerto, la cual Dios destruyó por su maldad)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
所多瑪 这个專有名詞 地名在希伯來文的意思是 "燃燒的"
被神用如雨般的火和硫磺所毀滅的城市
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
所多玛 这个专有名词 地名在希伯来文的意思是 "燃烧的"
被神用如雨般的火和硫磺所毁灭的城市
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Sô-đôm: thành xây ở đồng bằng, phía Nam chỗ của dân Ca-na-an. Xem H5467
